20110116013607.000|20110116013610.000|CC1|LEE COWAN, NBC NEWS, TUCSON.    
20110116013610.000|20110116013902.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110116013610.000|20110116013612.000|CC1|>>> MEANTIME, THE TRAGEDY IN    
20110116013612.000|20110116013616.000|CC1|TUCSON HAS HEATED UP A NATIONAL 
20110116013616.000|20110116013616.000|CC1|DEBATE OVER GUNS, ESPECIALLY IN 
20110116013616.000|20110116013617.000|CC1|ARIZONA, WHERE THE LAWS MAKE IT 
20110116013617.000|20110116013619.000|CC1|EASY FOR MOST PEOPLE TO OWN OR  
20110116013619.000|20110116013624.000|CC1|EVEN CARRY A GUN.

20110116015747.000|20110116015747.000|CC1|CURRENTS IN THE DEEP SEA, BUT   
20110116015747.000|20110116015748.000|CC1|ALSO THERE'S BACTERIA, ACTUALLY 
20110116015748.000|20110116015749.000|CC1|MICROBIAL COLONIES EATING AWAY  
20110116015749.000|20110116015752.000|CC1|AT THE HULL.                    
20110116015752.000|20110116015754.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ON THE RECENT      
20110116015754.000|20110116015755.000|CC1|EXPEDITION TO TIT"TITANTIC," TH 
20110116015755.000|20110116015757.000|CC1|CABLE FROM THE                  
20110116015757.000|20110116015758.000|CC1|REMOTELY OPERATED VEHICLE       
20110116015758.000|20110116015758.000|CC1|ACCIDENTALLY SNAGGED THE SHIP'S 
20110116015758.000|20110116015759.000|CC1|RAILING.                        
20110116015759.000|20110116015800.000|CC1|SCIENTISTS SAY THOSE CRUSTY     
20110116015800.000|20110116015801.000|CC1|TRAILS AND THE DUST YOU SEE     
20110116015801.000|20110116015802.000|CC1|KICKING UP THERE IS WHAT THE    
20110116015802.000|20110116015803.000|CC1|BACTERIA LEAVES BEHIND AFTER    
20110116015803.000|20110116015804.000|CC1|EATING.                         
20110116015804.000|20110116015805.000|CC1|>> PART OF WHAT I'M HEARING THIS
20110116015805.000|20110116015806.000|CC1|TIME THAT SHOCKS ME IS IN 20 OR 
20110116015806.000|20110116015809.000|CC1|25 YEARS WE MAY START TO SEE THE
20110116015809.000|20110116015811.000|CC1|DECKS OF "TITANTIC" COLLAPSING. 
20110116015811.000|20110116015812.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BECAUSE THE        
20110116015812.000|20110116015812.000|CC1|PICTURES ARE SO STUNNING, PEOPLE
20110116015812.000|20110116015815.000|CC1|MAY NOT REALIZE 40% OF DEBRIS   
20110116015815.000|20110116015818.000|CC1|FIELD, MORE THAN SIX SQUARE     
20110116015818.000|20110116015820.000|CC1|MILES, REMAINS MOSTLY           
20110116015820.000|20110116015821.000|CC1|UNDOCUMENTED AND UNSTUDIED.     
20110116015821.000|20110116015823.000|CC1|THE FIRST EXTENSIVE MAPPING OF  
20110116015823.000|20110116015824.000|CC1|THE AREA JUST TOOK PLACE FIVE   
20110116015824.000|20110116015826.000|CC1|MONTHS AGO.                     
20110116015826.000|20110116015829.000|CC1|>> ICEBERG STRAIGHT AHEAD.      
20110116015829.000|20110116015830.000|CC1|>> Reporter: EXPERTS SAY THE    
20110116015830.000|20110116015832.000|CC1|POPULAR MOVIE ONLY TELLS ONE

20110116015834.000|20110116015835.000|CC1|SANK.

20110116015838.000|20110116015839.000|CC1|HULL PLATING FLOODING THE LOWER 
20110116015839.000|20110116015840.000|CC1|DECK.

20110116015843.000|20110116015846.000|CC1|HULL TO GIVE WAY.
